channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 20:06 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 20:06 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on subsequent messages.#Pokrovskaya_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 20:00 A.curring in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
